attributes.action: Make delivery companies directly accountable to the end customer
attributes.additional_details: Because hardly a day goes by without someone for instance posting  a picture of an unknown front door sent to them by a delivery company which has mis-delivered their package but reported to the supplier that they delivered it OK or similar.
attributes.background:
If you order goods for delivery at home, the supplier chooses a delivery company who is only accountable to that supplier.
Should the item be delivered to an incorrect address or otherwise lost stolen or damaged whilst in the possession of the delivery company you have to argue with the supplier.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stricter laws for delivery companies: provide location info & access to parcels
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707922
